title: Static Page Metadata
description: Metadata for static pages keyed by page identifier.

^.+$.description: Metadata for a single static page.

url.description: Absolute path/URL for the page (must start with /).

description.description: Brief description of the page content.

image.description: Relative path to the page's representative image (can be empty).

date.description: Date string for the page (can be empty).

showHeader.description: Whether to display the site header on this page.

showFooter.description: Whether to display the site footer on this page.
